title: Is the Google AI sentient?
itunes:title: Is the Google AI sentient?
description:
A Google engineer was suspended after sharing a document suggesting that Google's LaMDA conversation model may be sentient. But if a machine was sentient, how could we tell? What does the Turing Test have to do with it? And can machines think?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
A Google engineer was suspended after sharing a document suggesting that Google's LaMDA conversation model may be sentient. But if a machine was sentient, how could we tell? What does the Turing Test have to do with it? And can machines think?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Google, LaMDA, artificial intelligence, AI, natural language processing, machine learning, artificial neural networks, sentience, consciousness, strong AI, bias, ELIZA, PARRY, Turing Test, Alan Turing
itunes:author: iHeartPodcasts
